entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 21 this evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 15. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 60 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 32 in the morning and minus 25 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 31 March 2023
